installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# steamcmd Base Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
# Image to install with is 'debian:buster-slim'
apt -y update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install curl lib32gcc1 ca-certificates wget tar

## just in case someone removed the defaults.
if [ "${STEAM_USER}" == "" ]; then
    echo -e "steam user is not set.\n"
    echo -e "Using anonymous user.\n"
    STEAM_USER=anonymous
    STEAM_PASS=""
    STEAM_AUTH=""
else
    echo -e "user set to ${STEAM_USER}"
fi

## download and install steamcmd
cd /tmp
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

# SteamCMD fails otherwise for some reason, even running as root.
# This is changed at the end of the install process anyways.
chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server

## install game using steamcmd
./steamcmd.sh +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} +force_install_dir /mnt/server +app_update ${SRCDS_APPID} ${EXTRA_FLAGS} validate +quit ## other flags may be needed depending on install. looking at you cs 1.6

## set up 32 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

## set up 64 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

# install EXILED (will NOT install the auto-updater too!)
ExiledVersion=$(curl https://api.github.com/repos/galaxy119/EXILED/releases -s | grep tag_name -m 1 | cut -d '"' -f 4)
ExiledURL="https://github.com/galaxy119/EXILED/releases/download/${ExiledVersion}/Exiled.tar.gz"
cd ..
mkdir .config
wget -O Exiled.tar.gz $ExiledURL
tar -xvf Exiled.tar.gz
rm SCPSL_Data/Managed/Assembly-CSharp.dll
mv -f Assembly-CSharp.dll SCPSL_Data/Managed/
mv -f EXILED/Exiled.Loader.dll .config/EXILED/
mv -f EXILED/Plugins/Exiled.Events.dll .config/EXILED/Plugins/
mv -f EXILED/Plugins/Exiled.Permissions.dll .config/EXILED/Plugins/
mv -f EXILED/Plugins/dependencies/0Harmony.dll .config/EXILED/Plugins/dependencies/
mv -f EXILED/Plugins/dependencies/Exiled.API.dll .config/EXILED/Plugins/dependencies/
mv -f EXILED/Plugins/dependencies/System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.dll .config/EXILED/Plugins/dependencies/
mv -f EXILED/Plugins/dependencies/YamlDotNet.dll .config/EXILED/Plugins/dependencies/
chmod +x SCPSL_Data/Managed/Assembly-CSharp.dll
chmod -R +x .config/EXILED/

# cleanup (remove the tar file)
rm -rf EXILED
rm Exiled.tar.gz

variables.name: SRCDS_APPID
variables.description: You shouldn't edit this. It tells Pterodactyl and Steam what game to install
